Package org.example.service.impl

Class TaskServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
org.example.service.impl.TaskServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.example.service.TaskService
@Service public class TaskServiceImpl extends Object implements org.example.service.TaskService
This is the class that realising business-logic of tasks in this app.
Author:
Kirill Zhdanov
